item.title: Company News: Construction Begins on TWT-Designed Project in Deptford
item.description: TWT is proud to have provided engineering design services for a new 66-home residential development at the intersection of Tanyard Road and Cattell Road, now officially moving into the site clearing phase.

item.title: Company News: Welcome Back, Aadan!
item.description: Many of you may remember Aadan from last summer, when he was a valuable member of our Site/Civil Engineering Department. This year, Aadan returns to expand his experience even further by joining our Transportation Engineering Department. We’re thrilled to have him back and look forward to the insight and enthusiasm he brings to our team.

item.title: Company News: Construction officially underway at Virtua Our Lady of Lourdes Hospital!

item.title: Company News: Two Kittens Looking For a Home!
